category.title: General
category.item: The GameSettings plugin allows you to change all gamemode related settings. Mostly all options will need a challenge restart or mapchange to take in effect. Its a good practice to allways restart the current challenge after changing this settings, even if a option don't need that.

category.title: How to...
category.item: Select a GameMode with the drop-down and setup your settings. If you change the GameMode the gamemode related section of the plugin will change on the fly.

category.title: General settings
category.item: GameMode as follows: Rounds, TimeAtttack, Team, Laps, Stunts or Cup
The time players can chat at roundend until the next map begins to load
Time the players has time to reach the finish after the first player reached the finish
Number of warmup rounds
Disables the respawn at start/checkpoint
Force the display of players even if player has disabled it on the client. Values: 0=disable, 1=show all, other value=minimum number of opponents

category.title: Rounds mode settings
